Package simple.escp.dom

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Line
    DOM class to represent each line in Page.
    Page
    DOM class to represent one page.
    PageFormat
    PageFormat represent page format section of a template.
    Report
    DOM class to represent a print result in form of collection of empty, one or more Page.
    TableColumn
    This class represents a column in TableLine.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PageFormat.LINE_SPACING
    This enum represents available fixed vertical line spacings.
